hero.subtitle: You're Invited to Celebrate
hero.title: Yash & Soniya
hero.description: Join us for a magical celebration filled with love, laughter, and unforgettable moments. Two hearts becoming one in a grand celebration of love and tradition.

timeline.title: Wedding Timeline
timeline.description: A detailed schedule of our two-day celebration filled with traditions, ceremonies, and joyous moments.

events.title: Arrival & Lunch
events.description: Welcome to our celebration! Guests arrive and enjoy a traditional lunch featuring Gujarati specialties and regional delicacies. The festivities begin with warm hospitality.

events.title: Ganesh & Pithi Ceremony
events.description: Sacred rituals begin with Ganesh Puja followed by the vibrant Pithi ceremony. A time of blessings, turmeric applications, and joyful family traditions.

events.title: Hi-Tea Service
events.description: Relax and mingle with delicious snacks, chaats, and refreshing beverages. Perfect time to connect with family and friends.

events.title: Sangeet & Dinner
events.description: The night comes alive with music, dance, and performances! Enjoy a lavish dinner with live counters, international cuisines, and endless entertainment.

events.title: Gotraj Pooja & Palla
events.description: Dawn breaks with sacred ceremonies. Traditional rituals marking the beginning of the wedding day with family blessings and prayers.

events.title: Wedding Breakfast
events.description: Start the special day with an elaborate breakfast featuring South Indian delicacies, Gujarati farsan, fresh juices, and traditional sweets.

events.title: Wedding Muhurat
events.description: The most sacred moment! Witness the beautiful wedding ceremony as Yash and Soniya take their vows in the auspicious muhurat time.

events.title: Sunset Varmala
events.description: A magical moment as the couple exchanges garlands during the golden hour. Capture this beautiful ritual against the sunset backdrop.

events.title: Bidai Ceremony
events.description: An emotional and beautiful farewell as the bride begins her new journey. A traditional ceremony filled with love, tears, and blessings.

menu.title: Culinary Journey
menu.description: Experience a gastronomic adventure with 10+ distinct dining experiences featuring live counters, regional specialties, and international cuisines.

rooms.title: Room Allocation
rooms.description: Your comfortable stay arrangements at the resort. Please coordinate with resort staff for luggage assistance.

rooms.label: Yash, Ajaykumar, Piyush, Sid, Rk, Ranka

notes: Check-in starts from arrival on November 24th
Resort staff will assist with luggage handling
Room maps available at reception desk
For any room-related queries, contact resort management
